pages.text: $(li)The Sack can save items, like a Shulker Box or a Backpack.$(br)$(li)You can carry a maximum two, because if you carry three or more you will receive the Slowness effect.
$(li)As you increase the number of Sacks, you will receive a stronger Slowness effect, making it harder and harder for you to move.
$(li)You can save items to a Sack from the inventory, dragging them into it and right clicking on it.
